issue.title: [Java] Implement or remove getCurrentSizeInBytes in VariableWidthVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5420](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5420). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now VariableWidthVector#getCurrentSizeInBytes doesn't seem to have been implemented. We should implement it or just remove it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5420?focusedCommentId=16852614) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4390
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4390>
